ComicInfo.Title: The Subject is... TABOO!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Subject is... TABOO!: Yrial and Lady Killer leave Atom Bob with Dr. Horla who specializes in comas, then take two days of rest and relaxation in a ski resort. While there, they are attacked by Taboo.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-27 20:46:49. [CVDB105290] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:19:33. [Issue ID 235033]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Chris DeFellipo,George Cox III,Violent Hues,Chris Defellipo,Violent Hues
ComicInfo.Letterer: T. Warren Montgomery,Brad Thompte,Brad Thomte,Brad Thomte
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Fred Cooper,George Cox III,Jasen Rodriguez,Rick Hoberg
ComicInfo.Characters: Grenade,Atom Bob (unconscious),Zip Zap,Dr. Horla,Teknight,Taboo [Paul Ntumbo],Lady Killer [Elena],Spectral (cameos to previous issues),Electrocute,Yrial
